text: "Stand by Me" is a R&B; ballad which was originally performed by Ben E. King. The song was inspired by the spiritual single "Lord Stand by Me". The song is on the soundtrack of the 1986 movie Stand by Me. Musicians who have covered the song include Prince Royce and John Lennon. In 1999, BMI named it the fourth most performed song of the 20th century. ==References== Category:Rhythm and blues ballads Category:1961 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Ben E.
